component.name: pohoda-realpad
component.summary: Integration tool for Pohoda and Realpad systems

description.p: Pohoda-Realpad is a PHP-based integration tool that synchronizes bank movements and payments between the Pohoda accounting system and the Realpad CRM system. It automates the process of extracting bank movements from Pohoda, filtering them based on specific criteria, and sending them to Realpad via its API. Features: - Synchronizes bank movements and payments. - Integrates with Realpad's API for seamless data exchange. - Provides detailed logging and error handling. This tool is designed for real estate developers and businesses using both Pohoda and Realpad systems to streamline their financial operations. For more information, visit the project homepage: https://github.com/Spoje-NET/pohoda-realpad This package provides integration between the Multiflexi system and the Pohoda-Realpad tool. It enables seamless synchronization of financial data between Pohoda, Realpad, and Multiflexi. Features: - Extends Pohoda-Realpad functionality to work with Multiflexi. - Automates data synchronization across multiple systems. - Provides detailed logging and error handling. This package is designed for businesses using Multiflexi alongside Pohoda and Realpad to streamline their financial operations. For more information, visit the project homepage: https://github.com/Spoje-NET/pohoda-realpad
